title: Collaborative Mathematics Learning Program Utilizing a Social Integration Education Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts, Experience with Online Learning Tools, and Basic Awareness of Collaborative Learning
context.additional_context: Mathematics education program aiming to strengthen social cohesion in multicultural environments. Asynchronous learning design applying Pela-Gandong's "communal collaboration" concept to mathematical problem-solving processes

learning_goals: Learners can apply collaborative strategies in mathematical problem-solving processes with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can create and submit a mathematics project report reflecting the concept of social integration.
Learners can complete at least three peer reviews using LMS-based collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
